title: Design
description: As I am very interested in good UX/UI design, I followed an Interaction Design course and learn about design tools such as Adobe Photoshop to polish my projects.

title: Software
description: When developing software I focus on clear code design, extensive test suites, proper documentation, and maintainability. I believe great apps start with great code.

title: Communication
description: From academic writing to teaching to public speaking, I believe frequent and effective communication is of great value and followed multiple courses to improve these skills.
